alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 11:03AM EDT until July 29 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Hazard affecting Perry County. North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, Traffic stopped on left side of bridge on KY 30 and 52. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 34.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EDT Thursday was 34.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 38.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 38.8 feet on 01/08/1946. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 5 PM EDT.
